VIDEOS.TITLE: Videos
VIDEOS.INFO: This page display all uploaded videos and display their status. Each video can be published, unpublished, viewed or deleted.
VIDEOS.SHARECODE: To share the video, copy the HTML code below and paste it in your page :
VIDEOS.REMOVE_FAIL: An error occured. Fail to remove video.

WATCHER.TITLE: Watcher
WATCHER.INFO: The watcher listens to one or several directories (depending on configuration). When a video package is added to one of the listened directory, the video is sent to the video platform.
WATCHER.STARTING: The Watcher is starting... Please wait
WATCHER.STARTED: The Watcher is currently listening to hot folder(s)
WATCHER.STOPPING: The Watcher is stopping... Please wait
WATCHER.STOPPED: The Watcher is actually not started

PROPERTIES.TITLE: Custom properties
PROPERTIES.INFO: Custom properties help you add properties to videos. By default a video has two properties, the video title and the video description. All properties present on this page will be available while editing a video.
PROPERTIES.NO_PROPERTIES: No custom properties at the moment
PROPERTIES.FORM_ADD_NAME_DESC: Name of the property as it will appear while editing a video
PROPERTIES.FORM_ADD_DESCRIPTION_DESC: A short description of the property
PROPERTIES.FORM_ADD_TYPE_DESC: Choose a form element that will be used to set the property value
PROPERTIES.REMOVE_FAIL: An error occured. Fail to remove property.

CATEGORIES.TITLE: Video Categories
CATEGORIES.INFO: This page allow to define categories to videos in order to organize and search them easily.
CATEGORIES.SAVE_FAIL: An error occured. Fail to save category.

CHAPTER.TITLE: Video - Chapter
CHAPTER.INFO: This page allow to define Chapter to illustrate the video with description.
CHAPTER.SAVE_ERROR: An error occured. Your changes could not be saved.
